verses.verse: תִּקְע֨וּ <WH8628> Blow שׁוֹפָ֜ר <WH7782> ye the trumpet בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> in Zion וְהָרִ֙יעוּ֙ <WH7321> and sound an alarm בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֔י <WH6944> in my holy יִרְגְּז֕וּ <WH7264> tremble כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> let all the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely בָ֥א <WH935> cometh יוֹם־ <WH3117> for the day יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֥י <WH3588> Surely קָרֽוֹב׃ <WH7138> for [it is] nigh at hand

י֧וֹם <WH3117> A day חֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> of darkness וַאֲפֵלָ֗ה <WH653> and of gloominess י֤וֹם <WH3117> a day עָנָן֙ <WH6051> of clouds וַעֲרָפֶ֔ל <WH6205> and of thick darkness כְּשַׁ֖חַר <WH7837> as the morning פָּרֻ֣שׂ <WH6566> spread עַל־ <WH5921> over הֶֽהָרִ֑ים <WH2022> upon the mountains עַ֚ם <WH5971> people רַ֣ב <WH7227> a great וְעָצ֔וּם <WH6099> and a strong כָּמֹ֗הוּ <WH3644> like לֹ֤א <WH3808> Nor נִֽהְיָה֙ <WH1961> there hath not been מִן־ <WH4480> at הָ֣עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> ever וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> after לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3254> the like neither shall be any more עַד־ <WH5704> against שְׁנֵ֖י <WH8141> it [even] to the years דּ֥וֹר <WH1755> of many וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> generations

לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before אָ֣כְלָה <WH398> devoureth אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> A fire וְאַחֲרָ֖יו <WH310> them and behind תְּלַהֵ֣ט <WH3857> burneth לֶֽהָבָ֑ה <WH3852> them a flame כְּגַן־ <WH1588> [is] as the garden עֵ֨דֶן <WH5731> of Eden הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> the land לְפָנָ֗יו <WH6440> before וְאַֽחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> them and behind מִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> wilderness שְׁמָמָ֔ה <WH8077> them a desolate וְגַם־ <WH1571> all פְּלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> yea and nothing shall escape לֹא־ <WH3808> and nothing הָ֥יְתָה <WH1961> become לּֽוֹ׃

כְּמַרְאֵ֥ה <WH4758> The appearance סוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> of horses מַרְאֵ֑הוּ <WH4758> of them [is] as the appearance וּכְפָרָשִׁ֖ים <WH6571> and as horsemen כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so יְרוּצֽוּן׃ <WH7323> so shall they run

כְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> Like the noise מַרְכָּב֗וֹת <WH4818> of chariots עַל־ <WH5921> on רָאשֵׁ֤י <WH7218> on the tops הֶֽהָרִים֙ <WH2022> of mountains יְרַקֵּד֔וּן <WH7540> shall they leap כְּקוֹל֙ <WH6963> like the noise לַ֣הַב <WH3851> of a flame אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> of fire אֹכְלָ֖ה <WH398> that devoureth קָ֑שׁ <WH7179> the stubble כְּעַ֣ם <WH5971> people עָצ֔וּם <WH6099> as a strong עֱר֖וּךְ <WH6186> array מִלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> set in battle

מִפָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> Before their face יָחִ֣ילוּ <WH2342> shall be much pained עַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> the people כָּל־ <WH3605> All פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> all faces קִבְּצ֥וּ <WH6908> shall gather פָארֽוּר׃ <WH6289> blackness

כְּגִבּוֹרִ֣ים <WH1368> like mighty men יְרֻצ֔וּן <WH7323> They shall run כְּאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> every one מִלְחָמָ֖ה <WH4421> of war יַעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> they shall climb חוֹמָ֑ה <WH2346> the wall וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> each בִּדְרָכָיו֙ <WH1870> on his ways יֵֽלֵכ֔וּן <WH1980> march וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> Nor יְעַבְּט֖וּן <WH5670> and they shall not break אֹרְחוֹתָֽם׃ <WH734> their ranks

וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> Neither shall one אָחִיו֙ <WH251> another לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִדְחָק֔וּן <WH1766> thrust גֶּ֥בֶר <WH1397> every one בִּמְסִלָּת֖וֹ <WH4546> in his path יֵֽלֵכ֑וּן <WH1980> march וּבְעַ֥ד <WH1157> through הַשֶּׁ֛לַח <WH7973> upon the sword יִפֹּ֖לוּ <WH5307> and [when] they fall לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִבְצָֽעוּ׃ <WH1214> they shall not be wounded

בָּעִ֣יר <WH5892> in the city יָשֹׁ֗קּוּ <WH8264> They shall run to and fro בַּֽחוֹמָה֙ <WH2346> upon the wall יְרֻצ֔וּן <WH7323> they shall run בַּבָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> upon the houses יַעֲל֑וּ <WH5927> they shall climb up בְּעַ֧ד <WH1157> through הַחַלּוֹנִ֛ים <WH2474> at the windows יָבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> they shall enter in כַּגַּנָּֽב׃ <WH1590> like a thief

לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> before רָ֣גְזָה <WH7264> shall quake אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> The earth רָעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH7493> shall tremble שָׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> them the heavens שֶׁ֤מֶשׁ <WH8121> the sun וְיָרֵ֙חַ֙ <WH3394> and the moon קָדָ֔רוּ <WH6937> shall be dark וְכוֹכָבִ֖ים <WH3556> and the stars אָסְפ֥וּ <WH622> shall withdraw נָגְהָֽם׃ <WH5051> their shining

וַֽיהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God נָתַ֤ן <WH5414> shall utter קוֹלוֹ֙ <WH6963> his voice לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before חֵיל֔וֹ <WH2426> army כִּ֣י <WH3588> Surely רַ֤ב <WH7227> great מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> [is] very מַחֲנֵ֔הוּ <WH4264> for his camp כִּ֥י <WH3588> is indeed עָצ֖וּם <WH6099> for [he is] strong עֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> that executeth דְבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> his word כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Surely גָד֧וֹל <WH1419> [is] great יוֹם־ <WH3117> for the day יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God וְנוֹרָ֥א <WH3372> terrible מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> and very וּמִ֥י <WH4310> can יְכִילֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3557> and who can abide

וְגַם־ <WH1571> even עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> now נְאֻם־ <WH5002> Therefore also now saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שֻׁ֥בוּ <WH7725> turn עָדַ֖י <WH5704> with בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבַבְכֶ֑ם <WH3824> ye [even] to me with all your heart וּבְצ֥וֹם <WH6685> and with fasting וּבְבְכִ֖י <WH1065> and with weeping וּבְמִסְפֵּֽד׃ <WH4553> and with mourning

וְקִרְע֤וּ <WH7167> And rend לְבַבְכֶם֙ <WH3824> your heart וְאַל־ <WH408> and not בִּגְדֵיכֶ֔ם <WH899> and not your garments וְשׁ֖וּבוּ <WH7725> and turn אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for חַנּ֤וּן <WH2587> for he [is] gracious וְרַחוּם֙ <WH7349> and merciful ה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֶ֤רֶךְ <WH750> slow אַפַּ֙יִם֙ <WH639> to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> and of great חֶ֔סֶד <WH2617> kindness וְנִחָ֖ם <WH5162> and repenteth עַל־ <WH5921> and הָרָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> him of the evil

מִ֥י <WH4310> Who יוֹדֵ֖עַ <WH3045> Who knoweth יָשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> [if] he will return וְנִחָ֑ם <WH5162> and repent וְהִשְׁאִ֤יר <WH7604> and leave אַֽחֲרָיו֙ <WH310> behind בְּרָכָ֔ה <WH1293> a blessing מִנְחָ֣ה <WH4503> him [even] a meat offering וָנֶ֔סֶךְ <WH5262> and a drink offering לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> angels פ
תִּקְע֥וּ <WH8628> Blow שׁוֹפָ֖ר <WH7782> the trumpet בְּצִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> in Zion קַדְּשׁוּ־ <WH6942> sanctify צ֖וֹם <WH6685> a fast קִרְא֥וּ <WH7121> call עֲצָרָֽה׃ <WH6116> a solemn assembly

אִסְפוּ־ <WH622> Gather עָ֞ם <WH5971> the people קַדְּשׁ֤וּ <WH6942> sanctify קָהָל֙ <WH6951> the congregation קִבְצ֣וּ <WH6908> assemble זְקֵנִ֔ים <WH2205> the elders אִסְפוּ֙ <WH622> gather עֽוֹלָלִ֔ים <WH5768> the children וְיֹנְקֵ֖י <WH3243> and those that suck שָׁדָ֑יִם <WH7699> the breasts יֵצֵ֤א <WH3318> go forth חָתָן֙ <WH2860> let the bridegroom מֵֽחֶדְר֔וֹ <WH2315> of his chamber וְכַלָּ֖ה <WH3618> and the bride מֵחֻפָּתָֽהּ׃ <WH2646> out of her closet

בֵּ֤ין <WH996> between הָאוּלָם֙ <WH197> between the porch וְלַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> and the altar יִבְכּוּ֙ <WH1058> weep הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <WH3548> Let the priests מְשָׁרְתֵ֖י <WH8334> the ministers יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְֽיֹאמְר֞וּ <WH559> and let them say ח֧וּסָה <WH2347> Spare יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and עַמֶּ֗ךָ <WH5971> thy people וְאַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and give נַחֲלָתְךָ֤ <WH5159> not thine heritage לְחֶרְפָּה֙ <WH2781> to reproach לִמְשָׁל־ <WH4910> should rule over בָּ֣ם גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> that the heathen לָ֚מָּה <WH4100> Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> them wherefore should they say בָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> among the people אַיֵּ֖ה <WH346> Where אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> angels
וַיְקַנֵּ֥א <WH7065> be jealous יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Then will the LORD לְאַרְצ֑וֹ <WH776> for his land וַיַּחְמֹ֖ל <WH2550> and pity עַל־ <WH5921> on עַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> his people

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> will answer יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yea the LORD וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and say לְעַמּ֗וֹ <WH5971> unto his people הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going שֹׁלֵ֤חַ <WH7971> Behold I will send לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּגָן֙ <WH1715> you corn וְהַתִּיר֣וֹשׁ <WH8492> and wine וְהַיִּצְהָ֔ר <WH3323> and oil וּשְׂבַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH7646> and ye shall be satisfied אֹת֑וֹ <WH854> and I וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will never אֶתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> therewith and I will no more make אֶתְכֶ֥ם <WH853> ע֛וֹד <WH5750> again חֶרְפָּ֖ה <WH2781> you a reproach בַּגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> among the heathen

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> הַצְּפוֹנִ֞י <WH6830> from you the northern אַרְחִ֣יק <WH7368> But I will remove far off מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> and I וְהִדַּחְתִּיו֮ <WH5080> [army] and will drive אֶל־ <WH413> about אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> him into a land צִיָּ֣ה <WH6723> barren וּשְׁמָמָה֒ <WH8077> and desolate אֶת־ <WH854> and its פָּנָ֗יו <WH6440> with his face אֶל־ <WH413> about הַיָּם֙ <WH3220> sea הַקַּדְמֹנִ֔י <WH6931> toward the east וְסֹפ֖וֹ <WH5490> and his hinder part אֶל־ <WH413> about הַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> sea הָאַֽחֲר֑וֹן <WH314> toward the utmost וְעָלָ֣ה <WH5927> shall come up בָאְשׁ֗וֹ <WH889> and his stink וְתַ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> shall come up צַחֲנָת֔וֹ <WH6709> and his ill savour כִּ֥י <WH3588> for הִגְדִּ֖יל <WH1431> great things לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> because he hath done

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְאִ֖י <WH3372> Fear אֲדָמָ֑ה <WH127> not O land גִּ֣ילִי <WH1523> be glad וּשְׂמָ֔חִי <WH8055> and rejoice כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִגְדִּ֥יל <WH1431> great things יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> will do

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְאוּ֙ <WH3372> Be not afraid בַּהֲמ֣וֹת <WH929> ye beasts שָׂדַ֔י <WH7704> of the field כִּ֥י <WH3588> for דָשְׁא֖וּ <WH1876> do spring נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> for the pastures מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> of the wilderness כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עֵץ֙ <WH6086> for the tree נָשָׂ֣א <WH5375> beareth פִרְי֔וֹ <WH6529> her fruit תְּאֵנָ֥ה <WH8384> the fig tree וָגֶ֖פֶן <WH1612> and the vine נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> do yield חֵילָֽם׃ <WH2426> army

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> then ye children צִיּ֗וֹן <WH6726> of Zion גִּ֤ילוּ <WH1523> Be glad וְשִׂמְחוּ֙ <WH8055> and rejoice בַּיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> in the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> for he hath given לָכֶ֛ם אֶת־ <WH853> הַמּוֹרֶ֖ה <WH4175> you the former rain לִצְדָקָ֑ה <WH6666> moderately וַיּ֣וֹרֶד <WH3381> and he will cause to come down לָכֶ֗ם גֶּ֛שֶׁם <WH1653> for you the rain מוֹרֶ֥ה <WH4175> the former rain וּמַלְק֖וֹשׁ <WH4456> and the latter rain בָּרִאשֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7223> in the first

וּמָלְא֥וּ <WH4390> shall be full הַגֳּרָנ֖וֹת <WH1637> And the floors בָּ֑ר <WH1250> of wheat וְהֵשִׁ֥יקוּ <WH7783> shall overflow הַיְקָבִ֖ים <WH3342> and the fats תִּיר֥וֹשׁ <WH8492> with wine וְיִצְהָֽר׃ <WH3323> and oil

וְשִׁלַּמְתִּ֤י <WH7999> And I will restore לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> to you the years אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which אָכַ֣ל <WH398> hath eaten הָֽאַרְבֶּ֔ה <WH697> that the locust הַיֶּ֖לֶק <WH3218> the cankerworm וְהֶחָסִ֣יל <WH2625> and the caterpiller וְהַגָּזָ֑ם <WH1501> and the palmerworm חֵילִי֙ <WH2426> army הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> my great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שִׁלַּ֖חְתִּי <WH7971> which I sent בָּכֶֽם׃
